name: Z-Overwhelming Grief
effect: The user faints. Reduce foe's Strength. Dexterity. Special. Defense and Sp. Defense by 2. Inflicts Drowsy.  Inflicts Paralysis. Lasts for a whole scene. Roll 3 Chance dice to Flinch the foe.
description: Octavius pierces the foe with one of his golden tendrils, filling their mind with an overwhelming barrage of images of his own death and downfall, leaving them in a state of overwhelming grief and depression.
